ygData.subject: Re: Question on mutually exclusive input nodes for FS-NEAT
ygData.msgSnippet: Ty, I do not believe anyone has ever implemented mutual exclusion on combinations of input nodes in FS-NEAT.  At least I have not heard of anything like that.

Ty, I do not believe anyone has ever implemented mutual exclusion on 
combi=
nations of input nodes in FS-NEAT.  At least I have not heard of 
anything =
like that.  However, it doesn't sound hard to implement in 
practice and co=
uld be a good idea in some domains.

ken
